backend/main.mo: Main canister actor providing access control, user approval flows, and domain types for products, contacts, estimates, purchases, and transactions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI layering fixes with associated files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short human‑written summaries used for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables and base styles defining colors, borders, and light/dark mode behavior.
frontend/index.html: Application HTML entry point with PWA metadata, icons, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining icons, theme colors, display mode, metadata, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and network-first fetch caching with precache and runtime caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling Internet Identity auth, profile setup modal, dashboard routing, and PWA prompts.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Compact access-denied UI card with optional back button for unauthorized access cases.
frontend/src/components/AdminBackupModul: Provides admin-only backup export and import UI with file validation, BigInt conversion, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordMod: Empty file placeholder for an admin password modal component.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, footer, desktop navigation, mobile drawer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/BillingModule.ts: Full billing UI for managing estimates, branding, payments, printing, and Bluetooth printer integration.
frontend/src/components/BluetoothPrinter: Dialog displaying Bluetooth printer requirements and supports printing a formatted instruction sheet.
frontend/src/components/ChangePasswordMo: Empty file placeholder for a password change modal.
frontend/src/components/ContactsModule.t: Manages contacts with CRUD operations, tabbed lists, dialogs, and pending amount calculations.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Displays business overview metrics including product stats, stock value, low stock alerts, and contact counts.
frontend/src/components/EstimatePrintVie: Component for printing estimates with standard or thermal formats, including browser and Bluetooth printing workflows.
frontend/src/components/FinanceModule.ts: Renders finance dashboards with reports, filters, and print functionality for products, contacts, estimates, purchases, and transactions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding, link to caffeine.ai, and version info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app title, theme toggle, user menu, and mobile menu trigger.
Inventory management interface for listing, filtering, and updating product stock levels.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePrintView: Empty placeholder component file for invoice printing.
Mobile navigation drawer wrapping PrimaryNavigation inside a sliding sheet.
frontend/src/components/MobileNumberModa: Empty placeholder component file for a mobile number modal.
frontend/src/components/ModulePageHeader: Reusable header block for module pages with title, subtitle, icon, and optional actions.
frontend/src/components/PriceOverrideDia: Modal prompting admin approval when selling price is below cost, showing profit/loss details and confirmation actions.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryNavigatio: Renders top or sidebar navigation with role‑based item visibility and module switching callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProductAutocompl: Searchable popover autocomplete for selecting products by name or category with search filtering.
frontend/src/components/ProductsModule.t: Product catalog manager with create, edit, and delete actions, forms, and admin‑restricted controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name during initial setup.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseModule.t: Purchase management UI handling creation, editing, deletion, line‑item pricing validation, and admin overrides.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Displays a delayed PWA install prompt handling beforeinstallprompt, installation state, and user dismissal.
frontend/src/components/SortControls.tsx: Sorting controls allowing field selection and toggling ascending/descending order.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing access control, and refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBluetoothThermalPr: Implements a React hook that manages Bluetooth thermal printer connection, writable characteristic discovery, printing, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, handling user profiles, roles, backups, and domain data operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useThermalQuickPrevie: Manages thermal preview settings with localStorage persistence and utilities to update or reset defaults.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables including light/dark modes and overlay component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for an admin login screen.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with module switching and role-based access for admin backup tools.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the Internet Identity login UI and feature overview for accessing the ERP system.
frontend/src/types/web-bluetooth.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type definitions for the Web Bluetooth API, covering devices, GATT servers/services/characteristics, filters, and navigator.bluetooth.
frontend/src/utils/sort.ts: Implements generic comparison helpers for strings, numbers, bigints, and dates, plus a utility to sort filtered lists.
frontend/src/utils/thermalQuickPreview.t: Defines thermal receipt preview settings and utilities that generate CSS for on-screen preview and print styling.
frontend/src/utils/thermalReceiptEncodin: Builds ESC/POS command sequences to encode thermal receipt data, including headers, items, totals, and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, border radii, animations, and scanning project files for class usage.
project_state.json: Describes the project's architecture, features, and known issues for the ERP system running on the Internet Computer.
